attributes.additional_details: Young students have had no face to face education, they had to pay for halls of residents while being in lockdown and in many cases with no access to reliable internet. They have also been locked down at home while still having to pay full tuition fees and board. And universities are using their own discretion to fleece Parents and students.
attributes.background: Discount International University fees for U. K residents Who don’t yet qualify for home fees by 50% and also to foreign students coming into the U. K.

rejection.details:
Fees for international students are set by individual universities, not the Government or House of Commons, but you may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Require Universities to partially refund tuition fees for 19/20 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550738

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762
